worklogs.comment:
tianchen92 commented on pull request #5470: ARROW-6661: [Java] Implement APIs like slice to enhance VectorSchemaRoot
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5470
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6661](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6661).
   
   Currently in Java Implementation there is no APIs like slice for record batch like C++/Python.
   This issue is about to implement slice/getVector/addVector/removeVector.

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.

fields.description:
Currently in Java Implementation there is no APIs like slice for record batch like C++/Python.

This issue is about to implement slice/getVector/addVector/removeVector.
fields.summary: [Java] Implement APIs like slice to enhance VectorSchemaRoot
